welcome_messages: <User> is the lisan al gaib. As it was written!
Welcome, <User>. We've been expecting you ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Welcome <User>. Leave your weapons by the <Group_Name> door.
A wild <User> appeared.
<User> just arrived. Seems OP - please nerf.
Challenger approaching - <User> has appeared!
<User> has joined the <Group_Name> Discord server! It's super effective!
It's <User>! Praise the sun!
Never gonna give <User> up. Never gonna let <User> down.
Ha! <User> has joined <Group_Name>! You activated my trap card!
Cheers, love! <User>'s here!
It's dangerous to go alone in <Group_Name>, take <User>!
<User> is here to kick <Group_Name> butt and chew bubblegum. And <User> is all out of gum.
A Golden Spirit, blessed with radiance of justice. I saw it within <User> and their friends... As long as it's there, they'll be fine.
Behold, the saviour of all existence, <User>!
<User>? More like <<Purchase_Membership_URL>>
I think <User> took a wrong turn to Cavern, so we pointed them here!
<User> used to be an adventurer until they took an arrow to the knee.
Their name is, their name is, their name is <User>!
I asked ChatGPT how to make <Group_Name> a better place, and it gave us <User>.
SkyNet is launching an attack against <Group_Name>! But don't worry, <User> will protect us!
Is it a bird? Is it a plane? Nope! It's <User> coming down on their brand new scooter!
<User> has hacked their way into the server!
`if (username == `<User>`) print('Welcome to <Group_Name>!');`
@Committee welcomes <User>

My name is <User>, you accessed invalid memory.
Prepare to Segmentation fault (core dumped)
I am become <User>, joiner of the <Group_Name> Discord server.
<User> navigated here by cardinal directions and vibes.
<User> has joined the Eternal Scrum.
Their palms are sweaty, knees weak, arms are heavy. <User>'s spaghetti.
What’s new <User>-doo, we’re coming after you, you’re gonna solve that mystery.
What's that coming over the hill, is that a <User>?
I heard <User> got some cookies ontop of their fridge.
It's-a you, <User>!

Some people in this world hold unimaginable power and superhuman abilities...
Oh btw unrelated but <User> just joined, say hi.

`$ ./introduce.ts -user '`<User>`'`
`\> Welcome to <Group_Name>, `<User>`!`

I see the player you mean.
<User>
Yes. Take care. It has reached a higher level now. It can read our thoughts.
Hey, <User>. You're finally awake. You were trying to cross the border, right? Walked right into that Imperial ambush, same as us, and that thief over there.
You're a wizard, <User>
aaAAA*AAA**AAA-*** Oh wait, it's only <User>
<User> entered the server. Fatal error. <Group_Name> shutdown failure.
Finally, <User>, a worthy opponent! Our battle will be legendary!
I forgot the niceties, you can call me TeX-Bot. Hiya Papaya, <User>!

According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way a <User> should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground. The <User>, of course, flies anyway because <User> doesn't care what humans think is impossible.
No one expects the <User> inquisition!
Freeze, <User>! This is TeX-Bot! You're sentenced to 3 years in the <Group_Name> Discord server for illegally searching us up on the Guild website!
Looks like <User> stumbled into the not-so-secret hideout of <Group_Name>.
The truth is <User>.... the game was rigged from the start.
Did you ever hear the tragedy of Darth <User> the Wise? I thought not, it's not a story the lecturers would tell you.
`<coroutine object BaseInductCog.get_random_welcome_message at 0x0000011EFD355120; user_object:`<User>`>`
roles_messages:
_ _
React to this message to get pronoun roles
:regional_indicator_h: - He/Him
:regional_indicator_s: - She/Her
:regional_indicator_t: - They/Them

_ _
React to this message to get year group roles
:zero: - Foundation Year
:one: - First Year
:two: - Second Year
:regional_indicator_f: - Final Year (incl. 3rd Year MSci/MEng)
:regional_indicator_i: - Year in Industry
:regional_indicator_a: - Year Abroad
:regional_indicator_t: - Post-Graduate Taught (Masters/MSc)
:regional_indicator_r: - Post-Graduate Research (PhD)
:regional_indicator_j: - Joint Honours
:a: - Alumnus
:regional_indicator_d: - Postdoc

_ _
React to this message to join the **opt in channels**
:speech_balloon: - Serious Talk
:house_with_garden: - Housing
:video_game: - Gaming
:tv: - Anime
:soccer: - Sport
:briefcase: - Industry
:pick: - Minecraft
:technologist: - GitHub
:bookmark: - Archivist
:ramen: - Rate My Meal

_ _
React to this message to **__opt out__** of the #starboard
:no_entry_sign: - Messages you send **won't** be eligible to be added to the starboard, and stars you add to a message won't be counted towards the starboard threshold
:star: - Your messages **can** be added to the starboard and stars you add to messages **will** be counted towards the starboard threshold

_ _
React to this message to opt in to News notifications
:speaker: - Get notifications when we `@News`
:mute:- Don't get notifications when we `@News`

> We will still use `@everyone` messages if there is something urgent

kill_cog_messages.confirmation_message:
Hi <Committee>, are you sure you want to kill me?
 This action is irreversible and will prevent me performing any furhter actions until I am manually rebooted.

Please confirm using the buttons below.
kill_cog_messages.killed: My battery is low and it's getting dark...

make_member_cog_messages.user_is_already_a_member: :information_source: No changes made. You're already a member - why are you trying this again? :information_source:
make_member_cog_messages.student_id_already_used: :information_source: No changes made. This student ID has already been used by someone else. Please contact a <Committee> member if this is an error. :information_source:

reminder_messages.invalid_delay_input: The value provided in the <Delay> argument was not a time/date.
reminder_messages.duplicate: You already have a reminder with that message in this channel!
